AUTHOR: palmtree5
INSTALL_MSG:
Thanks for installing EventMaker, which allows you to create and manage events for servers.
[p]help EventMaker to see commands. Requires pytz for eventual time zone support.
For support: <http://support.palmtree5.com>

If you like my work and want to support me, please consider becoming a Patron over at <https://patreon.com/palmtree5>
NAME: EventMaker
DESCRIPTION: Allows for creating and joining events and provides a notification at the start time
